description: Projection model used to convert sensor coordinates to/from cartesian coordinates.

num_cells.description: Resolution of the image along this axis, set as the number of cells along the axis.

elevation.description: Properties of the projection model along the elevation axis.

azimuth.description: Properties of the projection model along the azimuth axis.

elevation.description: Properties of the projection model along the elevation axis.

azimuth.description: Properties of the projection model along the azimuth axis.

lidar_origin_to_beam_origin.description: Offset between the Ouster LiDAR frame's origin and the laser beam's start point (radial direction). For illustrations and more information, please see the Ouster sensor's manual.

lidar_origin_to_sensor_origin_z_offset.description: Offset between the Ouster sensor and LiDAR frame's origins (z-direction). For illustrations and more information, please see the Ouster sensor's manual.

fx.description: Fx according to ROS' CameraInfo convention: http://docs.ros.org/en/melodic/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/CameraInfo.html.

fy.description: Fy according to ROS' CameraInfo convention: http://docs.ros.org/en/melodic/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/CameraInfo.html.

cx.description: Cx according to ROS' CameraInfo convention: http://docs.ros.org/en/melodic/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/CameraInfo.html.

cy.description: Cy according to ROS' CameraInfo convention: http://docs.ros.org/en/melodic/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/CameraInfo.html.

type.description: Type of the projection model that should be used.
